SEARCH
Package hms.auth

Class Validation

java.lang.Object
hms.auth.Validation
public final class Validation extends Object
A utility class for validating email addresses and passwords based on specific criteria. This class cannot be instantiated.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • validateEmailAddress

      public static boolean validateEmailAddress(String emailAddress)
      Validates an email address based on a specified pattern.

      The pattern checks for a traditional email format with a local part followed by the "@" symbol and a domain part: {local}@{domain}. The local part of the email address only allows alphanumeric characters, underscores (_), and dots (.) as special characters. The domain part must follow a valid structure with alphanumeric characters and optional hyphens (-) or dots (.).

      Parameters:
      emailAddress - the email address to validate
      Returns:
      true if the email address is valid; false otherwise

    • validatePassword

      public static boolean validatePassword(String password)
      Validates a password against specific criteria:
      • Must be at least 8 characters long
      • Must contain at least one uppercase letter
      • Must contain at least one lowercase letter
      • Must contain at least one digit
      • Must contain at least one special character (!, @, #, $, %, ^, invalid input: '&', *)
      • Must not contain any spaces or tabs
      Prints detailed validation results to the console.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the password meets all criteria; false otherwise
